messages.content:
I'm implementing the Editor Process Priority Control feature. I'll be modifying the following files and line ranges:
- src/click/termui.py: lines 646-655 (edit function signature and docstring)
- src/click/_termui_impl.py: lines 530-535 (Editor class constructor) and 538-545 (edit_file method)

I'll implement the feature in the order specified in the plan, starting with adding the process_priority parameter to the edit() function in termui.py.

I'm implementing the custom editor arguments feature for Click's edit function. I'll be modifying the following files:
- src/click/termui.py: Adding editor_args parameter to edit function, updating type annotations, and adding documentation
- src/click/_termui_impl.py: Updating Editor class constructor and edit_file method to handle editor_args
- tests/test_termui.py: Adding comprehensive test cases

I'll be working on:
- src/click/termui.py lines 646-670 (adding editor_args parameter, type annotations, and docstring)
- src/click/_termui_impl.py lines 508-515 (updating Editor class constructor and edit_file method)
- tests/test_termui.py (adding new test cases at the end of the file)

Please let me know if you're working on any of these files or if you have any concerns about the line ranges I've specified.

I'm modifying src/click/termui.py, but I see you're working on the same file. Let me adjust my line ranges to avoid conflicts.

I'll be working on:
- src/click/termui.py lines 646-655 (edit function signature and docstring)
- src/click/_termui_impl.py lines 530-535 (Editor class constructor) and 538-545 (edit_file method)

I'll implement the feature in the order specified in the plan, starting with adding the process_priority parameter to the edit() function in termui.py.
